channel.title: Adjusting Teleport Spellbook Interface
channel.description:
i added in a skilling area, then i put my case's in already, i got buttons that are linked to the teleport but the interface on the client still says ape atoll, ice plateau , and their is a blank one i linked it too in the ancient's spellbook. but i'm not sure how to make it so when you hover over it , it displays, "skilling area" instead of ape atoll, ice plateau, etc.
any ideas?

item.title: Adjusting Teleport Spellbook Interface
item.dc:creator: @brendonpenwell brendonpenwell
